manual merge commit 014267c of new_multiGPU for resolving the hang issue of the GPU solve
added 3D Iterative Refinement; added more fixes for the memory leaks
more accurate memory tracking in pddistribute_allgrid
adding SupernodeToGridMap_t to map supernode to grid
minor change to enable Memory Usage printing
add pddistribute_allgrid_index_only, which is enssentially the first call of pddistribute_allgrid but simplified
store trf3Dpartition into dLUstruct_t to avoid recomputation for Fact == SamePattern_SameRowPerm or Factored; correct pddrive3d3 to for SamePattern_SameRowPerm
add the two-pass version of pddistribute which can be called on all grids to reduce memory peak in the redistribution
attempt to reduce the memory bottleneck in pddistribute in pddrive3d
adding ssvs3daux to refactor driver code
add a fix for C++ factorization code to work with 3D solve
Merge branch 'gpu_trisolve_new' of https://github.com/xiaoyeli/superlu_dist into gpu_trisolve_new
further fix for npz>1 regarding gpuEventRecord; note that GPU3DVERSION=1 doesn't work with NEW3DSOLVE=1 now because of no dAncestorFactor now for either CPU or GPU
incoporate Paul Lin's fix for the perlmutter build script, however debug option with -O2 is used instead of release option
update perlmutter script, note that Release compiling is still not working
a few fixes for the C GPU factorization code
FIX: communication tree datatype to MPI_C_COMPLEX.
Rename constant name EMPTY to SLU_EMPTY in util_dist.h, to avoid name clash with system defs.
fixed a few compiling errors and updated build and runscripts; perlmutter not working after the merge from gpu3d-batch
Removing module unload gpu as the GPU-Aware MPI bug that was crashing Perlmutter compute nodes was deployed during the maintenance 2-3 weeks ago
remove ijb_lookup* arrays and ib_lookup* arrays
Rename get_metis to get_metis_dist, to avoid name clash in serial SuperLU.

Merge pull request #139 from prj-/jolivet/fix-strict-prototypes

Fix -Wstrict-prototypes
updating perlmutter build/run scripts for GPU nodes
updating perlmutter CPU-only nodes batch script to be consistent with build script
updating cmake build for Perlmutter CPU-only compute nodes
make status variables factored[] and factoredU[] to be 32bit ints.
added frontier build and run scripts
Bug fix: calling pdgssvx/pdgssvx3d with nrhs=0 ignored the U data conversion and CPU-GPU transfers, which caused hanging in GPU solve when calling pdgssvx/pdgssvx3d later with nrhs>0

Updated xdistribute() and pxdistribute() to incorporate the new data structures
used in SpTRSV.
(the new SpTRSV itself still only works for double precision.)

Merge pull request #131 from jeanlucf22/rm_free_unused_ptr

Remove unused ptr and associated free
psymbfact.c: check return info to flag memory overflow
update perlmutter build scripts due to recent maitenance
Remove unused ptr and associated free

- more accurate memory counting for parallel symbolic and distribution routines.
- create {s,z} versions for new triangular solve (incomplete: only headers and helper functions).
- better command-line interface for pxdrive.c
fixed a few bugs for pdgssvx3d with npz>1 and RowPerm=NOROWPERM. However the code still crashes in symbfact with rankorder=0 (default)

gpu3d-batch.commit_message: fixing the memory leakage in the cpp code
Reorganized batched code
First working version of batched LU with flattened data
Merge branch 'gpu3d-batch' of https://github.com/xiaoyeli/superlu_dist into gpu3d-batch
Initial flat data structure batched LU
fixed the hang in 3d SpTRSV and crash in 2d SpTRSV; moved L data flattening after pddistribute; added utility to convert between skyline and row-wise uniform storage

fixed the hanging with GD by using NsDep as the default in estimateWeight; cleaned up ddistribute and ddist_psymbtonum as the comm-tree and flattend data are no more computed in these functions; removed Ucb_valdat/Ucb_inddat/Ufstnz_br_dat/Unzval_br_dat as the flattened skyline format is not used in CPU/GPU SpTRSV
manually incorporate Nan Ding's fix in the new_multiGPU branch (commit d7dd8bd9) for the NVSHMEM hanging
change the default option for estimateWeight
minor change
resolved merge conflicts; however, gcc with GPU3DVERSION=1 will still crash, nvidia is working correctly
fixed many memory leaks in the C factorization code; fixed a few in the C++ one, but couldn't free LU panels correctly
get the new 3D redistribution function to work; needs more complete tests
fixing a few compiling errors
resolve merge conflicts from master to gputrisolve_new
seems to working for 1,1,1 CPU
temporarily using previous dfbufs

ready for merging from master
added 2D solve from pdgstrs into the 2D solve component of pdgstrs3d_newsolve
fix the runtime error for SamePattern_SameRowPerm as trs_compute_communication_structure doesn't need to be called
minor fix compiling errors
changed int_t to int for a few data structures in the 3D solve codes; fixed a few compile warnings

move communication tree computation and contiguious LU to trs_compute_communication_structure; compute the 3D strucutre on all grids but only using LUstruct on grid 0; use supernode masks to scatter only neccessary LU factors
fixed a few bugs for pdgssvx3d with npz>1 and RowPerm=NOROWPERM. However the code still crashes in symbfact with rankorder=0 (default)
fix errors in pdgssvx_ABglobal

The new 3D solve is fully working with CPU, double precision, but should
be improved using the master 2D solve code next.
1. 2.5d factor dAncestorFactorBaseline is CPU only, so the cpp code only do CPU factorization now even if SUPERLU_ACC_OFFLOAD=1
2. move communication tree computation from pddistribute/ddistribute/ddist_psymbtonum to trs_compute_communication_structure. The GPU part hasn't been moved yet.
3. move broadcast of fmod/bmod/Urbs/Ucb_indptr/Ucb_valptr/bsendx_plist/fsendx_plist accross Z grid from pdgstrs3d/pdgstrs3d_newsolve to dp3dScatter
4. update bsendx_plist in trs_compute_communication_structure, which was causing hanging in the new 3D solve
5. add dbroadcastAncestor3d after pdgstrf3d to also support the new 3d solve with the old C 3D factorization
6. correct trs_x_reduction_newsolve
clean up code
adding new solve U solve
new 3D solve works for L now. Note: CMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=Release causes crash; SUPERLU_LBS=ND causes crash
